```{r library}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
seoul <- read.table("../juso.go.kr/202004_주소DB_전체분/지번_서울특별시.txt",
                    sep="|", stringsAsFactors=FALSE, 
                    comment.char="", colClasses="character")

seoul <- rename(seoul, "GwanRiBeonHo"="V1",
                "IlLyeonBeonHo"="V2",
                "BeopJeongDongKoDeu"="V3",
                "SiDoMyeong"="V4",
                "SiGunGuMyeong"="V5",
                "BeopJeongEupMyeonDongMyeong"="V6",
                "BeopJeongRiMyeong"="V7",
                "SanYeoBu"="V8",
                "JiBeonBonBeon(BeonJi)"="V9",
                "JiBeonBuBeon(Ho)"="V10",
                "DaePyoYeoBu"="V11")

head(seoul)

pathPrefix = '../data/'
pathPostFix = 'JiBeon_Korea.csv'
path = paste0(pathPrefix, pathPostFix)

write.csv(seoul, path, row.names = FALSE, fileEncoding = 'UTF-8')
```
